channel.title: Maps for your Data Platform. on
channel.description: Recent content in Maps for your Data Platform. on

item.title: Dekart Cloud
item.description: Introducing Dekart Cloud. Secure, worry-free Dekart instance at the cost of hosting it yourself on AWS or Google Cloud. Lightweight alternative for CARTO and Foursquare Studio. Start Free with BigQuery Requires Google Cloud Access Your Data Stays Yours. To make your legal and cybersecurity teams happy,we do not store or cache your credentials and query results in our backend. Passthrough Authentication We don't need your service account key. Short-lived Google OAuth token is passed from your browser to Google APIs.

item.title: Help Dekart
item.description: Help Dekart ðŸ’œ Dekart is an open-source project. With few amazing contributors, it is still very small. To become sustainable and successful, we need more companies using it, more people active on GitHub, and a larger Slack community. Choose your involvement Easy ðŸŒ± Spend 30 seconds Star Dekart on GitHub ðŸŒŸ More stars increase the chance for people to discover Dekart and choose to deploy it within their organizations.
